Messages.If the neon glimmer activates into neon: If the neon glimmer activates into neon glow on a feature symbol or on a winning winline it will trigger that feature or multiply the winline x4.

Messages.The neon glimmer turning into neon glow: The neon glimmer turning into neon glow on a feature symbol or on a winning combination will activate that feature or multiply the winline x4.

Messages.Wild symbols can complete winning combin: Wild symbols can complete winning combinations.

Messages.Neon glow appearing on a winning combina: Neon glow appearing on a winning combination awards a x4 multiplier.This will apply to all active win lines using this symbol.

Messages.Neon glow appearing round a scatter symb: Neon glow appearing round a scatter symbol on any position awards 250 coins.Multiple scatter symbols showing on the reels will not increase the pay out.

Messages.Neon glow appearing around a free spin s: Neon glow appearing around a free spin symbol on any position will award 6 free spins.Multiple free spin symbols showing on the reels will not increase the free spins awarded.

Messages.Neon glow appearing on a Bonus symbol in: Neon glow appearing on a Bonus symbol in any position on the reels will activate the Keno light bonus round.

Messages.Manually select or randomly select 10 nu: Manually select or randomly select 10 numbers from the available 28.There will be 15 numbers drawn randomly after pressing start.

Messages.The amount won is dependent on the amoun: The amount won is dependent on the amount of numbers drawn that match the selection chose.The amount that will be paid can be seen on the paytable in the game.

Messages.numbers first, or hit Random button: numbers first, or hit Random button

Messages.to pick or Hit Random button to automati: to pick or Hit Random button to automatically chose for you.

Messages.Choice complete, you can now hit Start b: Choice complete, you can now hit Start button.

Messages.Pick 10 Numbers or Hit Random button to: Pick 10 Numbers or Hit Random button to automatically chose for you.
